unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, filmmakers are packing their bags (and hard drives) to showcase their latest creations.
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, filmmakers are packing their bags and hard drives to showcase their latest creations.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a HUGE comeback this year. Think red carpets, chai breaks, and heated debates over plot twists.
normalised: Word on the street is that the J I O M A M I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a huge comeback this year. Think red carpets, chai breaks, and heated debates over plot twists.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers of a special screening celebrating Malayalam cinema during Onam are circulating. What better way to enjoy the festival than with a good movie and maybe some delicious Onam Sadhya afterwards?
normalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers of a special screening celebrating Malayalam cinema during Onam are circulating. What better way to enjoy the festival than with a good movie and maybe some delicious Onam Sadhya afterwards?

unnormalised: Indie filmmakers are especially excited, seeing film festivals as a golden opportunity to get their work seen and maybe even land that elusive Bollywood deal. Forget Netflix & chill, it's all about festival hopping now!
normalised: Indie filmmakers are especially excited, seeing film festivals as a golden opportunity to get their work seen and maybe even land that elusive Bollywood deal. Forget Netflix and chill, it's all about festival hopping now!

unnormalised: Keep an eye out for emerging talents and maybe even a few Karan Johar sightings! It's gonna be a crazy ride! Are you ready for some serious cinematic indulgence? We sure are! Bring on the popcorn and the profound discussions!
normalised: Keep an eye out for emerging talents and maybe even a few Karan Johar sightings! It's gonna be a crazy ride! Are you ready for some serious cinematic indulgence? We sure are! Bring on the popcorn and the profound discussions!
